Doral.FIU College of Engineering and Computing: The Florida International University College of Engineering and Computing, located in Miami, Florida in the United States is one of the university's 26 schools and colleges and was founded in 1965. The College of Engineering and Computing offers bachelor's, master's and doctorate degrees within the college's 8 separate schools, departments and institutes. The College offers online and distance learning courses and programs through the FIU FEEDS program, a statewide initiative adopted in 1985.
